author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Grace Q4 Sales $459.5 Million
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - W. R. Grace & Co:
* GRACE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.98 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $1.81 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 SALES $459.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.72 TO $3.82 * SEES FY 2018 SALES UP 8 TO 10 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.97, REVENUE VIEW $453.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.75, REVENUE VIEW $1.81 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍INCREASING ANNUAL CASH DIVIDEND 14% AND DECLARING QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.24 PER SHARE​
* ‍RECORDED A PROVISIONAL CHARGE OF $143 MILLION IN Q4 TO REFLECT ESTIMATED IMPACTS OF U.S. TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017​
* ‍2018 OUTLOOK BASED ON AN EXPECTED ADJUSTED EFFECTIVE TAX RATE BETWEEN 27%-28%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
